responsibilities.text: Developed Risk Analysis application using Spring, Angular to present key analytics assisting investors understand portfolio impacts under different market conditions.
responsibilities.mobileText: Developed Risk Analysis application using Spring, Angular to present key analytics assisting investors understand portfolio impacts under different market conditions.

responsibilities.text: Engineered visualizations for market sensitivity using Angular, SpringBoot and integrated with advanced portfolio management suite for firms and advisors to seamlessly construct and manage fixed income portfolios.
responsibilities.mobileText: Engineered visualizations using Angular and integrated with advanced portfolio management suite for firms to seamlessly construct and manage fixed income portfolios.

responsibilities.text: Streamlined network calls and designed a data processing algorithm for components to improve performance and to reduce the Time to Interactive (TTI) of application.
responsibilities.mobileText: Streamlined network calls and designed a data processing algorithm for components to improve performance and to reduce the TTI of application.

responsibilities.text: Modularized simulation process using Python, Flask and exposed APIs to integrate with Angular frontend.
Developed widgets for Enterprise Content Management using Java, JavaScript to build persona driven dashboards for efficient control of projects and to observe insights of work processes.
responsibilities.mobileText: Developed widgets for Enterprise Content Management using Java, JavaScript to build persona driven dashboards for efficient control of projects and to observe insights of work processes.

responsibilities.text: Created APIs for Controlled Revision Tracking application and introduced new features to streamline document management process flow and to accelerate concurrent engineering processes using Java.
responsibilities.mobileText: Created APIs to streamline document management process flow and to accelerate concurrent engineering processes using Java.

responsibilities.text: Contributed to redesign architecture to accomplish bulk transitions faster, there by minimizing impact on scheduled processes.
responsibilities.mobileText: Contributed to redesign architecture to accomplish bulk transitions faster, there by minimizing impact on scheduled processes.

responsibilities.text: Identified OWASP vulnerabilities and resolved Injection, XSS, Authentication issues ensuring security compliance.
responsibilities.mobileText: Identified OWASP vulnerabilities and resolved Injection, XSS, Authentication issues ensuring security compliance.

responsibilities.text: Developed APIs for application using Ruby on Rails to enable self-service, bringing down high hold times to ensure customer satisfaction, there by minimizing customer-human interaction.
responsibilities.mobileText: Developed APIs for application using Ruby on Rails to enable self-service, bringing down high hold times to ensure customer satisfaction.

responsibilities.text: Engineered an in-house Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tool using Ruby on Rails, Angular to provide customer information and reports through a dashboard to support team for quick resolutions.
responsibilities.mobileText: Engineered an in-house CRM tool using Ruby on Rails, Angular to provide customer information and reports through a dashboard to support team for quick resolutions.
